ygData.subject: RE: staff of writhing
ygData.msgSnippet: will not proc before level 28.  it is believed high dex will lead to more procs. Shada D ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
ygData.messageBody:
will not proc before level 28. it is believed high dex will lead to more
procs.

Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Manda, Level 11 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server

> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> Anybody know how the secondary spell Chaotic Effect takes
> place? Is it
> level dependant or DEX dependant? I've been assuming it was
> dependant on my
> level...but yesterday I was grouped with a bard that was
> singing a song to
> increase DEX. Lo and behold, the staff was going off on
> spells! It was
> pretty cool, it hit for 48 dmg.
>
> I'm level 28, and with the bard's buff, my DEX was about 86.
>
> -- Lim'Dul
